# Orphaned External Dependencies

Local clones/checkouts (git-ignored).
Use for local-only clones you do not want to commit.

## Known Orphans

### NVBench
**Description:** CUDA Kernel Benchmarking Library. Used for rigorous micro-benchmarking of CUDA kernels.
**Location:** `extern/orphan/nvbench`
**How to get:**
```bash
git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/NVIDIA/nvbench.git extern/orphan/nvbench
```
